sentences.en: Corrosion is not covered by the warranty.
sentences.cn: 腐蚀不在保修范围之内.

sentences.en: Do you have an extended warranty?
sentences.cn: 你们有长期的质量保证吗？

sentences.en: How long is the warranty period?
If the warranty is limited, the terms may entitle you to a replacement or refund.
sentences.cn: 如果保修有限制，根据条款你也许可以要求退换或者退款。

sentences.en: The purchaser of this automobile is protected by the manufacturer's warranty.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车的买主可以得到厂方保单.

sentences.en: The television comes with a full two-year warranty.
sentences.cn: 这台电视机有整两年的保修期。

sentences.en: The warranty lapsed two months ago.
sentences.cn: 那项保证两个月前失效了.

sentences.en: This product comes with lifetime warranty.
This product comes with one year warranty.
sentences.cn: 这产品有一年的保固期.

sentences.en: This TV set is still under warranty.
sentences.cn: 这部电视机仍在保修期中.

sentences.en: This warranty is good for one year after the date of the purchase of the product.
sentences.cn: 本保证书自购置此产品之日起有效期为一年.

sentences.en: We have a one year warranty.
What warranty have you for doing this?
Yes, I have a one - year warranty.
sentences.cn: 是的, 我有一年的保修单.

words.tran_cn: 根据；证明；正当理由；委任状
[贸易]保证；[法]担保；授权；（正当）理由

phrases.tran_cn: 保修保险，延长保修；延长的保证期
有限质量保证；有限保固

trans.tran_en: a written agreement in which a company selling something promises to repair it if it breaks within a particular period of time
